Articles.Content:
So i was thinking, what being in existence (real or otherwise) would be more suited to applying for the internship with PRI besides our beloved Jebediah Kerman.

We know him, we love him. He's fearless, resolute, committed and has all the qualifications.

Today he is filling out the official application form to apply for the position of Student Internship/Co-Op to mine near-Earth asteroids for raw materials and i thought some other kerbonaughts might like to help with his cover letter/resume?

If not that's fine, me and fellow kerbonaught mcrbradbury will be writing them, however i felt that people here might be able to write them to a more professional and accurate standard giving jebediah the best possible chance at acceptance.

Ill update this post with details if there is a reply or not.
